Enjoying my VACation so far! I've found out that CS:GO isn't the only game that I have in this PC! WOW!

Personally, I love this game. The idea behind the game is awesome and its a great game to get into with a group of friends. What this game fails to do is respect its community. For years all the community has wanted is 128 tick servers and a better anti-cheat system. Instead we got the infamous "sometimes your opponent is having a good day" tip. Valve cares so little about the community and for that I strongly recommend you steer clear from even downloading this game.
